title: 2 BR In-Unit Laundry, Cozy Fireplace, Washer and Dryer
posting_body: The Mid-Market neighborhood is a treasure trove of hidden gems — social, cultural and culinary.
It’s a vibrant spectrum of restaurants, cafés, theater, nightlife, shops, museums, plazas and parklets.
This is the new Mid-Market… a renaissance in action.
The official Walk Score rates Mid-Market a “walking, transit and biking paradise.”
Many of San Francisco’s largest employers are within a 15-minute walk or 8-minute bike ride.
By foot, bike, train, bus, subway, cable car.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
